short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Essentials for power users: boost productivity with organized YouTube playlists and advanced browsing features.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Browser Power Toys enhances YouTube by allowing users to manage and organize videos beyond the default "Watch Later" list, automatically categorizing saved videos into playlists by month and many more features are coming.
